title: SMC_GetOverride (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GetOverride
This function block returns the velocity, acceleration and jerk override
factors of an axis.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment: TRUE: The override factors are read continuously

rows.Name: Valid
rows.Comment: TRUE: The override factors are read successfully

rows: TRUE: Function block is in operation
TRUE: Error has occurred during execution
The override factor for the velocity
The override factor for the acceleration/deceleration
The override factor for the jerk
